name: Perseverance (itch) (Littleman27)
description: Get ready for a journey of self-discovery as you navigate through a narrated story of perseverance in an immersive block world. With every step you take, you'll be transported into a world that demonstrates what's said in the voice lines. Experience the thrill of chasing after a goal that keeps getting further away, while exploring multiple paths along the way. As you progress, you'll gain a deeper appreciation for how we overcome obstacles in our lives. With a slow-paced and relaxing gameplay, this game will take you on an emotional rollercoaster that you'll never forget.
